> <OLD>
>
> "Track down whoever is trying to contact us"said the male while he heard the
> incoming signal

<NEW>

LORD ELDER looked down at his console and smiled. "No it is not
someone new contacting us, it is the restablishing of my link to
Nightshift."

Pressing a button the front screen began displaying everything that
the link was transmitting. He could see that NIGHTSHIFT as well as
POLAR CLW and his team appeared to be alright.

Then NIGHTSHIFT changed position revealing the tower itself.

LORD ELDER just stared as the screen revealed that the entire top
level of his tower was nearly destroyed and motes and small bits of
something was rising up from it up into the skies.

"What in the name of Primus have they done to my tower?" ELDER in an
incredulous voice glancing at PERCEPTOR and TALON although it is
obvious he does not expect them to have an answer .

(TAG)

- Preston
